name: Per Arnoldi
biography:
Painter and Graphic Designer.  Represented in collections of Museum of Modern Art (New York); Stedelijk Museum (Amsterdam); Victoria and Albert Museum (London); Gemeentemuseum (Haag); Israel Museum (Jerusalem) and others.
1993 - Awarded the Danish Design Centre IG Prize for the fiftieth anniversary poster of the Thanks to Scandinavia Fund (U.S.), commemorating Scandinavian help in saving the lives of Jews during World War II.
1999 - Designed art installation for the Alexander Fleming Building (Foster and Partners, Architects) atrium, which was awarded a Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) award.
2002 - Designed official logo and poster of the 10th International Conference, International Society for Augmentative and Alternative Communication, Odense, Denmark (August 10th-15th, 2002).
